abstract.para: The installer software is the system that installs the operating system and the user's choice application from the installation media (CD, network, internet, etc.) quickly and problem-free. It is expected to end up with a functional system which requires no further configuration when the installer application finishes, which is generally used only once.

sect1.para:
Within the scope of Uludag Installer Project:
An installation scenario will be written, This scenario will be put through user tests and usability aspects will be examined, A user interface will be designed for the finalized scenario, The requirements for the software to run underneath this interface/scenario will be determined, The interface/scenario will be iterated until technical feasibility is reached, The graphics and media tasks for the installer will be outsourced, The installer software will be designed and coded, The final acceptance tests will be carried out on the real system.
Project contact: Barış Metin, baris@uludag.org.tr
